title: Video Shows Alt-Right Group Engaging in ‘Hail Trump’ Salute
subtitle: Video clips of a meeting of the National Policy Institute, a white supremacist/alt-right group, show speaker Richard Spencer leading a Nazi salute.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Members of the alt-right group the National Policy Institute can be seen on video doing a Nazi-like salute as speaker Richard Spencer calls out "Hail Trump, hail our people, hail victory!"
